name: SuperSpeed2D free
description:
SuperSpeed2D free is a racing puzzle game unlike anything you've seen before.
Your job is simple: Collect all the triangles without crashing into the junction points, and avoid the GhostTrains.
You can control the trains path by switching the junction points and also by flipping your train backwards and forwards. There are no brakes and your train is stuck on accelerate, so it just gets faster and faster.
You can collect missiles and use them to collect triangles or blow up the GhostTrains.
There isn't any time limit or score. All you have to do is collect ALL of the triangles .
The first few levels are not so hard, but as you progress to the upper levels, you will find it more and more challenging to play with SuperSpeed2D free!
Easy to learn, difficult to master!
